Reviews.Title: disappointing!!!
Reviews.Author: Pali "numero 1"
Reviews.Content: This is probably the worse phone I have ever had.  It is not user friendly at all. I have not downloaded many apps and do not use many apps. I don't use the bluetooth and only use data when I have wifi access.  I know this is not the galaxy 111 but based on the high ratings on Samsung phones I really expected better performance.  I just switched from a blackberry, but this is really disappointing.  Not even the basic features like making a call works well.  Its just two months and I really cannot put up with this for much longer.  Think I will go Iphone.Pros:  Nice size phone- attractive.cons:  The buttons on either side of the centre menu buttons do not light up and takes very long to respond when pressed.  There is no way to cut off or end a call other than waiting until the touch screen pops up with the end button which takes quite a while after you have dialed - this has resulted in the  person on the other end hearing me for at least 15 seconds after I think I have ended the calls.  Battery life started out really great for the 1st three weeks or so giving me at least 2 days without charging using wifi and apps.  Now - about 2 weeks later its down to less than a  day- I have to charge daily.  The dual sim does not allow you to  pick which sim to call from - it has to be set on 1 at a time and to change you have to go to the settings options and change it.  I had dual sim phones before and when you dialed a number there was an option to choose which sim to dial from.  For incoming calls it automatically diverts the calls from the sim which is not set, to the sim which is set without the callers knowing that their call is going to another carrier.Difficult to store numbers in the phone book - in fact from time to time I am unable to access some numbers which I know were stored and I did not delete. contacts which were automatically stored as SNS cannot be edited.Sometimes you dial a number, and press call- it just diverts back to the main menu- this happens regularly now.The list goes on.....I definitely will not recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This phone is a replacement for the android phone that I bought few weeks ago that didn't allow me to surfe the web. Even thought this phone is a little more expensive, but it works right of the box. Unlike the other phone which took 3 weeks to delivered (it was shipped from Singapore), this phone was delivered in 2 days. The resolution could be a little better. But I'm really happy with it so far.

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I was not completely sure before buying this product, but after using it I recommend it to you all. It is very very good phone for the price range.

Reviews.Title: Almost what I ordered
Reviews.Author: Annieja
Reviews.Content: I am clearly seeing that a white phone was shipped to me however I received a black phone. Did not bother with the hassle of a return since by then I was desperate for a phone. It has served me well so far, I have to recharge every couple of hours really literally I am not yet sure why. So happy buying....The memory storage on this phone is crappy I now wished I hadn't bought this phone such a nuisance everytime to see insufficient storage popping up all the time. Thing is it is only updates on things the phone came with that used up the storage and you cannot delete or send anything to SIM hard

Reviews.Title: Product Didn't Work:
Reviews.Author: Vidya J Narimalla
Reviews.Content: I purchased two smartphones as gifts for India. One worked and the other didn't. It was embarrassing to give a gift that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: THE SIM #1 DOES NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: lydia
Reviews.Content: THE PHONE DOES NOT READ THE SIM CARD ON SLOT #1, DIDN'T  WORK FOR ME, BECAUSE I USED A LOT BOTH SIM, I PAID A LOT OF MONEY FOR THIS PHONE.

Reviews.Title: Cannot Hear Incoming Calls
Reviews.Author: Michael K. Ingram
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for my sister who was visiting from the Caribbean so she could take it back home with her.  I paid for expedited service and the phone still did not arrived until after she left.  I was told they had a mixed up. I then had to spend extra money to get it to the Caribbean.  My sister just got the phone and now it is not working.  She cannot hear her incoming calls.  Her friends can hear her but she cannot hear them.  I am very disappointed.  Now I tried to send this phone back before I sent it to the Caribbean but they gave me the run around and told me I would have to pay a fee etc.  DO NOT GET THIS PHONE IT DOES NOT WORK AND THE COMPANY THAT IS SELLING THIS PHONE WILL NOT WORK WITH YOU!!

Reviews.Title: I met what I need
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: Samsung Galaxy y Duos GT-S6102 Dual sim Smartphone with Bluetooth, WiFi, Android OS, HSDPA 850 / 2100 - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - White - good choice if you need managed two sims

Reviews.Title: GREAT FOR OVERSEAS TRAVEL
Reviews.Author: V.J. Shannon-Rohde
Reviews.Content: I purchased my Samsung Duo in Australia a few years ago for $150 AUS. The best advantage for this phone is overseas travel where you can buy a sim cards for any amount  in any country in Europe and Australia  - whether Vodaphone, Virgin, Orange etc..... use what you want and just top up as needed - you will get a local number for that country to use. Much cheaper than using a US phone with exorbitant roaming charges. I am using mine here for the time being while waiting for the Sansung 5. I  call overseas regularly - reception great - and photos excellent. I use T-Mobile prepaid unlimited text and calls $60 a month and pay an additional $10 a month for unlimited International calls and text. No need for plans and you get an unlocked phone to use. The only problem I have is downloaded large files.

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone biut could be better with memory
Reviews.Author: Bernard Amaning
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice little smartphone.  This is my third purchase.  Excellent for making phone calls on two different sims card for international travel.  This was my motivation for purchasing.  If you want to use its 'smart" and app features, this may not be a phone for you. Full keyboard is barly readable and the phone is very slow to responses.  The memory is so small you can barely download 2 more apps to the originally installed. Other than that, a perfect phone for making and recieving calls on two differents sim cards at the same time.

Reviews.Title: My old phone was awful
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The phone I bought with my contract 8 months ago was horrible with Any background noise.  Even a slight wind would keep me from hearing the other person on the line, and vice versa. It was a disaster on a recent visit to Manhattan.This Samsung came to the rescue, with a whole serving of extras.  To this day, I'm finding more apps and extras this Smartphone can give me.  My brother bought one as well from Amazon, as well as friends who are tired of their phone's limitations.The price is icing on the cake.

Reviews.Title: nice phone

Reviews.Content: bought it for my granny for Christmas and she loves it a lot she doesn't leave it down at all i can't say anything bad about this phone

Reviews.Content: The product is good and meet my expectations. since I bought it I have not noticed any problem with it. I recommend it positively for use

Reviews.Title: ok ok ok.

Reviews.Content: it appears easy to use as i bought this for a mature friend who had no problems navigating and learning this phone.

Reviews.Content: Excellent buy. Of course the battery life is similar to those of other smartphones.  But putting two sim chips in Lima was a breeze, the phone recognized them easily and was able to receive and make calls inmediately.  This phone is unlocked, FYI.

Reviews.Author: S. Swenson
Reviews.Content: . . .plus couldn't get two SIM cards to work, but it probably takes more than a  store clerk.  One disadvantage to buying these complex babies online is that you don't get good support when it comes to setup.The phone works OK, but probably the same as most others if you don't need the Duo bit.I don't like the touch screen, which needs pretty concentrated poking and swiping to operate.

Reviews.Title: Excelente

Reviews.Content: El producto lo recomiendo es facil de utilizar,hace mi vida màs facil  Es uno de los telefonos mas completos que existen. Excelente

Reviews.Content: She likes this phone very much and I think it is just as good as agalaxy three which is r times more so go figure

Reviews.Title: http://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B008LR0TWI/ref=aw_cr_item_title

Reviews.Title: Turned Out Fine
Reviews.Author: Digital Steps Marketing
Reviews.Content: My daughter is happy so I am too! I did not like the fact the box came in bad shape, I almost returned it,, so one star deduction for that and bad business to UPS for putting my package on the wrong doorstep! Thank God for a good neighbor huh? Overall once we decided to open it it was not damaged. Seller communicated effectively about the product and was glad to refund my money if I decided to send it back.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone for the price , but.....
Reviews.Author: Demmy Demi
Reviews.Content: The Item was delivered as advertised. The item was also delivered within the sepcified time period. Phone is good for general use and its of good quality though it smaller than your regular smart phone. The only slight problem I have with it is not enough signal strenght which leads to lots of drop calls. I'm not too worried becasue i bought the phone as a placeholder till my contracts runs out to join another carrier and get a better phone.

Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Content: This is a great product. It arrived quickly in the mail and is good for the price. It works super so far and have no trouble with it. Great services from this company.

Reviews.Title: Great!

Reviews.Content: It is just the size I was looking for and the features are great.  The price is right!Arrived on time..... I love my phone.

Reviews.Title: very difficult to use and understand
Reviews.Author: sylvia frumes
Reviews.Content: The settings for phone listings are a complete mystery.  How do you add or subtract from group lists that were transferred from prior phone? How do u add to favorites?  None of the settings are intuitive.  Why isn't it compatible with att 4g network?  Why do u need a sim cor photos.  Why can't I attach a photo or anything else to an sms?  The phone is just not very convenient to use.Ugh.  Do you want it back?LJF

Reviews.Content: It is a good phone at a good price and that's not being enough double chip (DUOS) and even better is besides all android and a small, thin compared to others. and apart is SAMSUNG

ProductInfo.Features:
Network: 850 / 900 / 1,800 / 1,900MHz; 3G bands: 850 / 2,100MHz. Operation System: Android 2.3 (Gingerbread). User Memory: 160MB; External Memory: upgradable up to 32GB. Dual SIM (dual stand-by); Powerful 832MHz processor
Form Factor: Full Touch BAR, 3.14 inches screen size, TFT capacitive.
Camera: 3 Megapixel fixed-focus camera, Video : MPEG4, H.263, H.264; Music Player with SoundAlive, 3.5mm Ear Jack, Stereo FM Radio with RDS; Samsung TouchWiz; POP3/IMAP Email; A-GPS; Bluetooth v3.0, Wi-Fi
Battery: Standard battery, Li-ion 1,300 mAh; Stand-by: Up to 360 h; Talk time: Up to 9 h
Includes: Galaxy Y Duos S6102 white, Standard battery, AC travel charger, Stereo headset, User manual
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-S6102 Galaxy Y Duos Dual SIM Smartphone with Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, Android OS, HSDPA 850 / 2100 - Unlocked Phone - No Warranty - White
